snippet: How’s this for a family road trip? The travel writer Charles Scott plans to cover a 1,700-mile portion of the trail by bike with his 12-year-old son and 6-year-old daughter.
abstract: Travel Q&A with travel writer and blogger Charles Scott in which he discusses 1,300-mile bike trip he is taking along Meriwether Lewis and William Clark's 1804 route exploring Louisiana Purchase; Scott is undertaking trip with his 12-year-old son and 6-year-old daughter.
lead_paragraph: How’s this for a family road trip? The travel writer Charles Scott plans to cover a 1,700-mile portion of the trail by bike with his 12-year-old son and 6-year-old daughter.

headline.print_headline: The writer Charles Scott on following Lewis and Clark by bike.
headline.main: Biking the Lewis and Clark Trail, Kids in Tow

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail
